title: [Sleevina's Magic Shoppe]
[Sleevina's General Store]
description: Enclosed by refined oak-paneled walls, the shop features a woven Vornavian silk rug in the center of its dark oak floor.  A gold and crimson wyvern tapestry hangs under the Vornavian silk ceiling.  Right near the front is a beveled glass-covered case and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet.
